__e: Well, excuse me for really, really liking you and doing everything I can so that we can be together.
I'm your wife, and it's my duty to love and support you no matter what.

Sure, it was a mistake not thinking about the future, but that doesn't mean that it was a mistake being with you or loving you, and... and I married you because I wanted to spend the rest of your life with you,
You know? I love you so much. That's why I hate myself.
I can still care about you more than anyone ever has.
You think no one will love you for you, so you pretend to be someone else. Don't you see?
I knew I could love you the minute I first saw you.
I don't want to be afraid of what my brother will do to me for loving you.
I don't love you inspite of all this, I stared loving you because of this.
And I will love you for the rest of my life. Until the day I die.
People should appreciate you for who you are, not for what they think you should be.
He should love you for what you are and not for what he wants you to be...
